ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
AND(SPEN_Create_Job_in_Live__c = TRUE , ISNEW() ,ISBLANK( SPENEnvironmentalPlanner__c ) , ISBLANK( SPEN_LandAssistant__c ) , ISBLANK( SPEN_LandOfficer__c ) , ISBLANK( SPEN_LandManager__c )
)
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please add at least one user in L&P user section
